ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Accretion disk with broken-power law emissivity profile, black hole emission line. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: An emission line from an accretion disk with a broken powerlaw emissivity profile around a black hole. Uses Ari Laor's calculation including GR effects (ApJ 376, 90). Modified from xslaor model by Andy Fabian.
This is an additive model component.
